title: 10 high-paying jobs AI could replace or automate next: Check full list
description: As artificial intelligence continues to advance at an unprecedented pace, even some of the most lucrative careers are facing major disruption. Here are several high-paying jobs that are at significant risk of being transformed, or in some cases completely replaced, by AI-driven automation.
content:
The landscape of education and careers is transforming rapidly, and students aiming to study abroad must recognise a new reality: even some of the most lucrative jobs may no longer guarantee long-term security.

title: Mexico plans to build Latin America's most powerful supercomputer
description: MEXICO CITY — Mexico unveiled plans Wednesday to build what it claims will be Latin America’s most powerful supercomputer — a project the government says will help the country capitalize on the rapidly evolving uses of artificial intelligence and exponentially expand the country’s computing capacity.

title: China Tech Companies Chart Different AI Courses Amid Capex Arms Race
description: Artificial intelligence is no longer confined to flashy demos—it’s now a line on the income statement, and an even bigger one on capital expenditure budgets.
content:

title: Robots and artificial intelligence to replace 6,000 workers at major tech company
description: Tech giant HP is set to axe up to 6,000 jobs worldwide as it turns to robots and artificial intelligence to cut costs and speed up innovation, with most layoffs hitting internal operations
content:

title: MIT study says 12 percent of jobs are already replaceable by AI, finance, health and services hit hardest
description: A new MIT study reveals that artificial intelligence is capable of replacing nearly 12 per cent of U.S. jobs, with finance, healthcare, and professional services seeing the greatest impact.
content: As machines get smarter, the fear of them replacing human jobs is becoming increasingly evident. In fact, a new report suggests that artificial intelligence is already capable of replacing roughly 12 per cent of jobs in the United States. And the sec... [3591 chars]

title: Introducing the next era of the digital age: Identic artificial intelligence
description: If our digital identities are controlled by centralized corporations, our discourse and democracy will be shaped by incentives we do not influence
content:

title: AI Is Selling The Dream. But It’s The Forgotten Foundations That Run The World
description: Artificial intelligence has become the corporate language of certainty. Every major enterprise now claims to be reshaping itself around it. Strategies are refreshed, job titles updated, and earnings calls echo with the promise of transformation. Yet we at Greyhound Research believe the conversation has drifted from substance to spectacle.

title: Hoping That AGI Will Enable Humans To Talk Directly To Animals
description: Once AI becomes artificial general intelligence (AGI), AGI might be a universal animal language translator. Humans and animals converse via AGI. Here's the inside scoop.
content: In today’s column, I explore a touted belief that once AI becomes AGI (artificial general intelligence), we will finally be able to converse with animals. How so? The claim is that AGI will straightaway have an inherent capacity to communicate with a... [13374 chars]

title: AI in Video Production: The Future of Creativity Meets Authentic Storytelling
description: Artificial Intelligence is transforming how videos are conceived, created, and delivered.
